body: List of characters who appears in this doujin,in order(Or at least the majority):Abel(Dragon Quest V),Link(Legend of Zelda),Pit(Kid Icarus),Red(Pokemon),Ness(Earthbound/Mother 2),Blue (Tresure Hunter G),Kevin (Trials of Mana),Don't know his name but its from Romancing Saga 2 (SNES),Akira Tadokoro (Live a Live),Tonberry (Final Fantasy Series),Donbe (Shin Onigashima), Prince Sable & Prince Richard (Kaeru No Tame Ni Kane Wa Naru),???,again don't know their names but they are from Onyanko Town (Arcade),Prince Alus (Final Fantasy III,NES).
